short_summary: The purchase of One LYOPHILISER for the laboratory
description: The purchase of the Laboratory and Scientific Equipment - SA E60PV-19EQUI, one (1) lyophilizer
full_summary:
### Request for Proposal - Purchase of Freeze Dryer/Lyophilizer

#### Overview

The procurement of a freeze dryer/lyophilizer for Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada’s Eastern Service Center in Sherbrooke, Quebec.

#### Call Details

* **Reference Number**: CB-893-42823314
* **Publication Date**: 2023-12-01
* **Tender Closing Date and Time**: 2024-01-12T14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2023-12-20
* **Expected Contract End Date**: 2024-03-29

#### Background

Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada’s Eastern Service Center requires a laboratory and scientific equipment - SA E60PV-19EQUI, one freeze dryer/lyophilizer for the Harrow Research and Development Center.

#### Eligibility and Admissibility

Contractors interested in participating in this procurement must meet the requirements specified in the tender package and comply with the terms and conditions outlined in the [Request for Proposal] (https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tenders/).

#### Selection Criteria

* Lowest price

#### Important Documents and Dates

* Tender package is attached to this notice.
* The tender closing date is January 12, 2024, at 2:00 PM.
* Bidders are responsible for ensuring that their submissions are received by the contracting authority prior to the tender closing date.

#### Contact Information

* Mr. ????? (Supply Specialist)
* Phone Number: ????, Email: rachael.johnston@agr.gc.ca

#### Programming

This procurement is being conducted in accordance with the requirements of the [Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)]. 
The procurement of the equipment has been done to open Sources, Breastfeeders.

#### Goods and Services

* Laboratory and scientific equipment (Freeze dryers/Lyophilizers)
	+ Suppliers will provide equipment that meet the requirements outlined in the tender package
